repairedDockerfile:
###################################################
# Dockerfile to build scde 2.0.1 container images #
#             Based on Ubuntu 14.04               #
###################################################

# Set the base image to Ubuntu
FROM ubuntu:14.04

# File Author
MAINTAINER Geoffray Brelurut <brelurut@biologie.ens.fr>

# Install required programs and clean up
RUN echo "deb http://cran.r-project.org/bin/linux/ubuntu trusty/" > /etc/apt/sources.list.d/cran.list; \
     apt-key adv --keyserver keyserver.ubuntu.com --recv-keys E084DAB9; \
     apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends --yes \
     r-base=3.3.1-1trusty0 \
     r-base-core=3.3.1-1trusty0 \
     r-base-dev=3.3.1-1trusty0 \
     r-recommended=3.3.1-1trusty0 \
     r-base-html=3.3.1-1trusty0 \
     r-cran-boot=1.3-17-1trusty0 \
     r-cran-class=7.3-14-1trusty0 \
     r-cran-cluster=2.0.4-1trusty0 \
     r-cran-codetools=0.2-14-2trusty0 \
     r-cran-foreign=0.8.66-1trusty0 \
     r-cran-kernsmooth=2.23-15-2trusty0 \
     r-cran-lattice=0.20-33-1trusty0 \
     r-cran-mass=7.3-44-1trusty0 \
     r-cran-matrix=1.2-6-1trusty0 \
     r-cran-mgcv=1.8-13-1trusty0 \
     r-cran-nlme=3.1.128-2trusty0 \
     r-cran-nnet=7.3-12-1trusty0 \
     r-cran-rpart=4.1-10-1trusty0 \
     r-cran-spatial=7.3-10-1trusty0 \
     r-cran-survival=2.39-4-2trusty0 \
     r-doc-html=3.3.1-1trusty0 \
     libcairo2-dev \
     libxt-dev \
     libnlopt-dev \
     wget; rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*; \
     wget https://cran.rstudio.com/src/contrib/nloptr_1.0.4.tar.gz \
          https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/MASS/MASS_7.3-45.tar.gz \
          https://cran.rstudio.com/src/contrib/Archive/RcppArmadillo/RcppArmadillo_0.7.200.2.0.tar.gz \
          https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/Rcpp/Rcpp_0.12.10.tar.gz; \
     if [ ! -f nloptr_1.0.4.tar.gz ]; \
     then \
     wget https://cran.rstudio.com/src/contrib/Archive/nloptr/nloptr_1.0.4.tar.gz; \
     fi; \
     R CMD INSTALL nloptr_1.0.4.tar.gz; \
     R CMD INSTALL Rcpp_0.12.10.tar.gz RcppArmadillo_0.7.200.2.0.tar.gz MASS_7.3-45.tar.gz; \
     wget https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/lambda.r/lambda.r_1.1.9.tar.gz \
          https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/futile.options_1.0.0.tar.gz \
          https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/futile.logger_1.4.3.tar.gz; \
     if [ ! -f futile.options_1.0.0.tar.gz ]; \
     then \
     wget https://cran.r-project.org//src/contrib/Archive/futile.options/futile.options_1.0.0.tar.gz; \
     fi; \
     if [ ! -f futile.logger_1.4.3.tar.gz ]; \
     then \
     wget https://cran.r-project.org//src/contrib/Archive/futile.logger/futile.logger_1.4.3.tar.gz; \
     fi; \
     R CMD INSTALL lambda.r_1.1.9.tar.gz futile.options_1.0.0.tar.gz futile.logger_1.4.3.tar.gz; \
     wget https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/rjson_0.2.15.tar.gz; \
     if [ ! -f  rjson_0.2.15.tar.gz   ]; \
     then \
     wget https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/rjson/rjson_0.2.15.tar.gz; \
     fi; \
     R CMD INSTALL rjson_0.2.15.tar.gz ; \
     wget https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/RColorBrewer_1.1-2.tar.gz; \
     if [ ! -f RColorBrewer_1.1-2.tar.gz ]; \
     then \
     wget https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/RColorBrewer/RColorBrewer_1.1-2.tar.gz; \
     fi; \
     R CMD INSTALL RColorBrewer_1.1-2.tar.gz; \
     wget https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Cairo_1.5-9.tar.gz; \
     if [ ! -f Cairo_1.5-9.tar.gz ]; \
     then \
     wget https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/Cairo/Cairo_1.5-9.tar.gz; \
     fi; \
     R CMD INSTALL Cairo_1.5-9.tar.gz; \
     wget https://cran.rstudio.com/src/contrib/brew_1.0-6.tar.gz \
          https://cran.rstudio.com/src/contrib/Rook_1.1-1.tar.gz; \
     if [ ! -f brew_1.0-6.tar.gz ]; \
     then \
     wget https://cran.rstudio.com/src/contrib/Archive/brew/brew_1.0-6.tar.gz; \
     fi; \
     if [ ! -f Rook_1.1-1.tar.gz ]; \
     then \
     wget https://cran.rstudio.com/src/contrib/Archive/Rook/Rook_1.1-1.tar.gz; \
     fi; \
     R CMD INSTALL brew_1.0-6.tar.gz Rook_1.1-1.tar.gz; \
     wget https://cran.rstudio.com/src/contrib/RMTstat_0.3.tar.gz; \
     if [ ! -f RMTstat_0.3.tar.gz ]; \
     then \
     wget https://cran.rstudio.com/src/contrib/Archive/RMTstat/RMTstat_0.3.tar.gz; \
     fi; \
     R CMD INSTALL RMTstat_0.3.tar.gz; \
     wget https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/modeltools_0.2-21.tar.gz; \
     if [ ! -f  modeltools_0.2-21.tar.gz ]; \
     then \
     wget https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/modeltools/modeltools_0.2-21.tar.gz; \
     fi; \
     R CMD INSTALL modeltools_0.2-21.tar.gz; \
     wget https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/snow/snow_0.4-1.tar.gz \
          https://www.bioconductor.org/packages/3.3/bioc/src/contrib/BiocParallel_1.6.6.tar.gz; \
     R CMD INSTALL snow_0.4-1.tar.gz  BiocParallel_1.6.6.tar.gz; \
     wget https://www.bioconductor.org/packages/3.3/bioc/src/contrib/BiocGenerics_0.18.0.tar.gz \
          https://www.bioconductor.org/packages/3.3/bioc/src/contrib/Biobase_2.32.0.tar.gz \
          https://bioconductor.riken.jp/packages/3.3/bioc/src/contrib/pcaMethods_1.64.0.tar.gz; \
     R CMD INSTALL BiocGenerics_0.18.0.tar.gz Biobase_2.32.0.tar.gz pcaMethods_1.64.0.tar.gz; \
     wget https://cran.rstudio.com/src/contrib/Archive/lattice/lattice_0.20-33.tar.gz \
          https://cran.rstudio.com/src/contrib/nnet_7.3-12.tar.gz \
          https://cran.rstudio.com/src/contrib/Archive/flexmix/flexmix_2.3-13.tar.gz; \
     if [ ! -f nnet_7.3-12.tar.gz ]; \
     then http://cran.rstudio.com/src/contrib/Archive/nnet/nnet_7.3-12.tar.gz; \
     fi; \
     R CMD INSTALL nnet_7.3-12.tar.gz lattice_0.20-33.tar.gz flexmix_2.3-13.tar.gz; \
     wget https://cran.rstudio.com/src/contrib/Archive/Matrix/Matrix_1.2-6.tar.gz; \
     R CMD INSTALL Matrix_1.2-6.tar.gz; \
     wget https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/MatrixModels_0.4-1.tar.gz; \
     if [ ! -f MatrixModels_0.4-1.tar.gz ]; \
     then \
     wget https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/MatrixModels/MatrixModels_0.4-1.tar.gz; \
     fi; \
     R CMD INSTALL MatrixModels_0.4-1.tar.gz; \
     wget https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/SparseM_1.77.tar.gz; \
     if [ ! -f SparseM_1.77.tar.gz ]; \
     then \
     wget https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/SparseM/SparseM_1.77.tar.gz; \
     fi; \
     R CMD INSTALL SparseM_1.77.tar.gz; \
     wget https://cran.rstudio.com/src/contrib/Archive/nlme/nlme_3.1-128.tar.gz \
          https://cran.rstudio.com/src/contrib/Archive/mgcv/mgcv_1.8-13.tar.gz; \
     R CMD INSTALL nlme_3.1-128.tar.gz mgcv_1.8-13.tar.gz; \
     wget https://cran.rstudio.com/src/contrib/Archive/RcppEigen/RcppEigen_0.3.2.9.1.tar.gz; \
     R CMD INSTALL RcppEigen_0.3.2.9.1.tar.gz; \
     wget https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/minqa_1.2.4.tar.gz; \
     if [ ! -f minqa_1.2.4.tar.gz ]; \
     then \
     wget https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/minqa/minqa_1.2.4.tar.gz; \
     fi; \
     R CMD INSTALL minqa_1.2.4.tar.gz; \
     wget https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/distillery/distillery_1.0-2.tar.gz \
          https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Lmoments_1.2-3.tar.gz \
          https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/scatterplot3d/scatterplot3d_0.3-37.tar.gz \
          https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/lattice/lattice_0.20-34.tar.gz \
          https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/lme4/lme4_1.1-12.tar.gz \
          https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/pbkrtest/pbkrtest_0.4-6.tar.gz \
          https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/quantreg/quantreg_5.29.tar.gz \
          https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/car/car_2.1-2.tar.gz; \
     if [ ! -f Lmoments_1.2-3.tar.gz ]; \
     then http://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/Lmoments/Lmoments_1.2-3.tar.gz; \
     fi; \
     R CMD INSTALL Lmoments_1.2-3.tar.gz distillery_1.0-2.tar.gz scatterplot3d_0.3-37.tar.gz lattice_0.20-34.tar.gz lme4_1.1-12.tar.gz pbkrtest_0.4-6.tar.gz quantreg_5.29.tar.gz car_2.1-2.tar.gz; \
     wget https://cran.rstudio.com/src/contrib/Archive/extRemes/extRemes_2.0-7.tar.gz; \
     R CMD INSTALL extRemes_2.0-7.tar.gz; \
     wget https://bioconductor.riken.jp/packages/3.3/bioc/src/contrib/limma_3.28.21.tar.gz \
          https://bioconductor.riken.jp/packages/3.3/bioc/src/contrib/edgeR_3.14.0.tar.gz \
          https://bioconductor.riken.jp/packages/3.3/bioc/src/contrib/scde_2.0.1.tar.gz; \
     R CMD INSTALL limma_3.28.21.tar.gz edgeR_3.14.0.tar.gz scde_2.0.1.tar.gz; \
     rm *.tar.gz; \
     apt-get remove --purge --yes wget; \
     apt-get clean;
